attributes.action: Set a mandatory 10 year prison sentence for carrying a knife in public
attributes.additional_details: Too many people are dying on our streets due to this silent killer with no major deterrent for carrying a knife in public, how many people and young kids have to die before you act on this matter..
attributes.background: Please set a mandatory prison sentence of 10 years with no parole for carrying a knife in public. The tragic loss of life has to stop.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Mandatory 10-year sentence for possession of a knife
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636853
